name: Drench (itch)
description:
After I get Steve From Accounting transferred to another branch, I'm able to maximize our profit vectors three months in a row. I get a call from HQ and I'm flown to our corporate reef. I slip into a squidsuit - a hyperintelligent squid that protects me from high pressure - and we sink into the blue water.

A short IF created for sub-Q's Love Jam 2018.
